gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 133, Kings 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Kings, 133-100. CJ McCollum recorded 30 points (7-10 3PT FG), seven rebounds and four assists for the Pelicans, while Brandon Ingram (15 points, eight assists) and Jonas Valanciunas (15 points, 12 rebounds) combined for 30 points in the victory. Domantas Sabonis tallied 17 points (8-12 FG), 10 rebounds and six assists for the Kings in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 22-15 on the season, while the Kings fall to 21-14.
